title: Persistable Reference
description: So-called persistable reference strings carry a serialized JSON structure simply for convenience of transport; the carrier does not need to understand the internal details. This schema declares the structure of this self-contained reference value payload. PersistableReferences come in various specializations. All variants contain a property "type", which can be used to parse into a specific class. The JSON string-serialized structures are used e.g. in abstract/AbstractMetaItem and in some reference-data entities.

type.title: Type of Persistable Reference
type.description: The type identifier and discriminator, fixed for a specific type'.

auth.title: Authority
auth.description: The name of the authority issuing the code.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code issued by the authority.

boundBox.title: WGS 84 Bounding Box
boundBox.description: WGS 84 bounding box in latitude longitude.

lonMin.title: Longitude Left
lonMin.description: The left longitude limit in degrees; the longitude can wrap around the datum line - then 'lonMin' is not the minimum longitude. Value range [-180,...,180] degrees from Greenwich.

lonMax.title: Longitude Right
lonMax.description: The right longitude limit in degrees; the longitude can wrap around the datum line - then 'lonMax' is not the maximum longitude. Value range [-180,...,180] degrees from Greenwich.

latMin.title: Latitude Lower
latMin.description: The lower or minimum latitude limit in degrees. Value range from South -90 to 90 North.

latMax.title: Latitude Upper
latMax.description: The upper or maximum latitude limit in degrees. Value range from South -90 to 90 North.

scale.title: Scale Factor
scale.description: The scale factor; formula:  y = scale*(x-offset)

measurement.title: Measurement
measurement.description: A measurement. It is a base measurement, also called dimension, if the 'ancestry' is 'root', a child measurement if the 'ancestry' contains more than one '.'-separated measurement names.

ancestry.title: Measurement Ancestry
ancestry.description: The ancestry of this dimension, unit quantity or measurement. Parent and child measurements are separated by a '.' symbol. An ancestry without a '.' is a base measurement or dimension.

unitSO.title: Unit Scale Offset
unitSO.description: A unit of measure, scale, offset parameterized.

symbol.title: Unit Symbol
symbol.description: The unit symbol or short name.

unitABCD.title: Unit Energistics
unitABCD.description: A unit of measure in Energistics ABCD parameterization.

symbol.title: Unit Symbol
symbol.description: The unit symbol or short name.

area.title: Area of Use
area.description: Area of use consisting of a bounding box in latitude and longitude WGS 84.

boundBox.title: Bounding Box
boundBox.description: The bounding box in latitude and longitude WGS 84 based.

authCode.title: Authority Code
authCode.description: The authority code for this item.

lateBoundCRS.title: Late-bound CRS
lateBoundCRS.description: Late-bound coordinate reference system, i.e. a CRS without a transformation binding to WGS 84.

name.title: CRS Name
name.description: The name of the late-bound coordinate reference system.

ver.title: Version
ver.description: The engine version issuing the definition.

wkt.title: Late-bound CRS WKT
wkt.description: Well-known text (Esri style) of the late-bound coordinate reference system.

authCode.title: Authority Code
authCode.description: The authority code for this item.

name.title: Single CT Name
name.description: The name of the simple cartographic transformation.

ver.title: Version
ver.description: The engine version issuing the definition.

wkt.title: Well-known Text
wkt.description: The well-known text (Esri style) defining this transformation.

authCode.title: Authority Code
authCode.description: The authority code for this item.

name.title: Compound CT Name
name.description: The name of the compound cartographic transformation.
name.example: Fallback NAD27 to WGS 84 (79)/NAD27 to WGS 84 (33)

ver.title: Version
ver.description: The engine version issuing the definition.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: The transformation policy - concatenated or fallback.

items.title: Transformation List
items.description: The ordered list of cartographic transformations.

cts.title: Transformation List
cts.description: The ordered list of cartographic transformations.

authCode.title: Authority Code
authCode.description: The authority code for this item.

earlyBoundCRS.title: Early-bound CRS
earlyBoundCRS.description: Early-bound coordinate reference system, i.e. a CRS with a transformation binding to WGS 84

name.title: CRS Name
name.description: The name of the early-bound coordinate reference system.

ver.title: Version
ver.description: The engine version issuing the definition.

lateBoundCRS.title: Late-bound CRS
lateBoundCRS.description: Late-bound CRS, which is bound to a single (singleCT) or compound (compoundCT) transformation to WGS 84.

singleCT.title: Single Transformation
singleCT.description: Single Transformation, which binds the late-bound CRS (lbCRS) to WGS 84. If absent, a compound transformation (compoundCT) must be present.

compoundCT.title: Compound Transformation
compoundCT.description: Compound transformation, which binds the late-bound CRS (lbCRS) to WGS 84. If absent, a single transformation (singleCT) must be present.

authCode.title: Authority Code
authCode.description: The authority code for this item.

compoundCRS.title: Compound CRS
compoundCRS.description: Compound coordinate reference system aggregating a horizontal to a vertical CRS.

name.title: CRS Name
name.description: The name of the compound coordinate reference system.

ver.title: Version
ver.description: The engine version issuing the definition.

horzLateBoundCRS.title: Horizontal late-bound CRS
horzLateBoundCRS.description: The horizontal CRS of a Compound CRS as late-bound CRS. If 'horzLateBoundCRS' is non-null, 'horzEarlyBoundCRS' must be null.

horzEarlyBoundCRS.title: Horizontal early-bound CRS
horzEarlyBoundCRS.description: The horizontal CRS of a Compound CRS as early-bound CRS. If 'horzEarlyBoundCRS' is non-null, 'horzLateBoundCRS' must be null.

vertLateBoundCRS.title: Vertical late-bound CRS
vertLateBoundCRS.description: The vertical CRS of the Compound CRS as late-bound CRS. If 'vertLateBoundCRS' is non-null, 'vertEarlyBoundCRS' must be null.

vertEarlyBoundCRS.title: Vertical early-bound CRS
vertEarlyBoundCRS.description: The vertical CRS of the Compound CRS as early-bound CRS. If 'vertEarlyBoundCRS' is non-null, 'vertLateBoundCRS' must be null.

authCode.title: Authority Code
authCode.description: The authority code for this item.

date.title: Date
date.description: A set of references describing date reference.

dateTime.title: Date Time
dateTime.description: A set of references describing date-time and time zone references.

timeZone.title: Time Zone
timeZone.description: The time zone reference specification. For data in UTC or with UTC offset this is 'UTC' or the serialized Windows TimeZoneInfo.
timeZone.example: Antarctica/South Pole Standard Time;720;(GMT+12:00) Antarctica/South Pole;Antarctica/South Pole Standard Time;Antarctica/South Pole Daylight Time;[10:01:1989;12:31:9999;60;[0;02:00:00;10;1;0;];[0;02:00:00;3;3;0;];];

azimuthReference.title: Azimuth Reference
azimuthReference.description: A set of parameters defining an azimuth reference. This type definition is a place-holder covering only TrueNorth at the moment. GridNorth and MagneticNorth references require specific properties, which are yet to be declared.

code.title: Azimuth Reference Code
code.description: The azimuth reference code, e.g. TrueNorth, GridNorth, MagneticNorth. Depending on the code other properties required like projected CRS and geo-magnetic model with observation date. Only TrueNorth does not require any additional properties.
